The movie is based on the book of the same name by Michael Crichton and it tells a story about a group of people who are stranded on an island after their plane crashes there. The group must work together to survive on the island, and they also must deal with some challenges that they encounter on the island, such as a lack of food and water, and a dangerous wild animal that roam free in the forest near the island.
Overall, "Jurassic Park" (2015) is an action-packed movie that tells an exciting story about a group of people who are stranded on an island after their plane crashes there. Based on your preferences for sound, a movie like "Schindler's List" would be an excellent recommendation.
The movie tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German industrialist who is known for his role in the Holocaust during World War II. The main focus of the movie is Schindler's efforts to save more than 600 Jewish people from being murdered by the Nazis during World War II.

In addition to the above aspects, other notable features of the movie include its excellent and well-timed storyline, its outstanding and talented cast (including such famous actors as Ben Kingsley, John Hurt, Albert Finney, Anthony Quaife, Sir Alexander Kier, etc.), its impressive and well-executed special effects, its excellent and well-timed soundtrack, its overall excellence and high quality, etc.

Overall, the movie "Schindler's List" is an excellent and highly recommended movie for anyone who enjoys watching movies.
